sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnmtgplaceresve ( resve_id , mtgrum_id , mtg_sj , rsvctm_id , resve_de , resve_begin_tm , resve_end_tm , atndnc_nmpr , mtg_cn , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #resveId# , #mtgrumId# , #mtgSj# , #rsvctmId# , #resveDe# , #resveBeginTm# , #resveEndTm# , #atndncNmpr# , #mtgCn# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnmtgplaceresve SET resve_id = #resveId# , mtgrum_id = #mtgrumId# , mtg_sj = #mtgSj# , rsvctm_id = #rsvctmId# , resve_de = #resveDe# , resve_begin_tm = #resveBeginTm# , resve_end_tm = #resveEndTm# , atndnc_nmpr = #atndncNmpr# , mtg_cn = #mtgCn# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() WHERE 1 = 1 AND resve_id = #resveId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnmtgplaceresve WHERE 1 = 1 AND resve_id = #resveId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT resve_id , mtgrum_id , mtg_sj , rsvctm_id , resve_de , resve_begin_tm , resve_end_tm , atndnc_nmpr , mtg_cn , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnmtgplaceresve WHERE resve_id = #resveId#

SELECT resve_id , mtgrum_id , mtg_sj , rsvctm_id , resve_de , resve_begin_tm , resve_end_tm , atndnc_nmpr , mtg_cn , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnmtgplaceresve WHERE 1=1
resve_id = #searchKeyword#
mtgrum_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY resve_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnmtgplaceresve WHERE 1=1
resve_id = #searchKeyword#
mtgrum_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
